reviewText: I had to ask for a replacement for my copy of the DVD because it would not play all the way through, and the replacement was just as bad. Old film footage of that time is poor anyway but this was one of the worst I have seen.

Graphic reminder of just how horrible the Holocaust was. Not all that much footage, though...perhaps I didn't read the description well before ordering. However, there is enough to make the point that the Holocaust was a despicable squandering of life. Seller shipped fast and it arrived as described.
I purchased this DVD to use in my American History class. It shows it like it was. Excellent documentary video presentation.
